alert.note: Alert for Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex (Massachusetts) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 08 at 7:37AM EDT by NWS Boston
info.description: ...Shower with gusty winds and possible funnel cloud moving across parts of Northeast Massachusetts through 815 AM EDT... At 734 AM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a heavy shower with gusty winds over Billerica, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Winds to 40 mph and possible funnel cloud. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Strong winds could cause minor damage such as downed branches. Locations impacted include... Lawrence, Haverhill, Methuen, Billerica, Andover, Lexington, Dracut, Tewksbury, North Andover, Burlington, Wilmington, North Reading, Bedford, Georgetown, Boxford, Newbury, Groveland, Rowley, and Carlisle. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...40 MPH
info.instruction: Get indoors when you hear thunder. Do not resume outdoor activities until at least 30 minutes after the storm has passed.

area.areaDesc: Central Middlesex County; Eastern Essex; Western Essex
